0.name: Memories Back as Echoes
0.fullDesc:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for {{1}} second(s). Enemies within the Special Dimension are placed in a Time Stop state, halting all their actions.
After entering battle against enemies afflicted with the Time Stop state, delays the action of all enemies by {{2, percent}}%, and then deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to {{3, percent}}% of Trailblazer's ATK.
Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.
0.shortDesc: Creates a Special Dimension. Enemies in the dimension <orangeStrong>cease actions</orangeStrong>. When entering battle against enemies in the dimension, delays the action of all enemies and deals minor Ice DMG to all enemies.

0.fullDesc: When the battle starts, Trailblazer's action advances by {{1, percent}}%. When Mem is first summoned, grants Mem {{2, percent}}% Charge.

0.name: Petite Parable
0.fullDesc: When using "Baddies! Trouble!," Mem immediately gains {{1, percent}}% Charge.

0.name: Magnets and Long Chains
0.fullDesc: When the Max Energy of an ally target that has "Mem's Support" exceeds {{1}}, for every {{2}} excess Energy, additionally increases the multiplier of the True DMG dealt via "Mem's Support" by {{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%, up to a max increase of {{4, percent}}%.

1.name: Narrator of the Present
1.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of ally targets with "Mem's Support" by {{1, percent}}%. When an ally target has "Mem's Support," the effect of "Mem's Support" also applies to the target's memosprite/memomaster. This effect cannot stack.

2.name: Gleaner of the Past
2.desc: When ally memosprites (aside from Mem) take action, Trailblazer regenerates {{1}} Energy. This effect can trigger a max of {{2}} time(s) per turn. The trigger count resets at the start of Trailblazer's turn.

3.name: Chanter of the Future

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.name: Dancer of the Muse
4.desc: When an ally target with 0 Max Energy actively uses an ability, Mem can also gain {{1, percent}}% Charge, and the multiplier of the True DMG dealt by this target via "Mem's Support" additionally increases by {{2, percent}}%.

5.name: Seamster of the Ode
5.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Bearer of the Revelation
6.desc: Ultimate's CRIT Rate is set at 100%.
